scripts.deploy: gcloud run deploy graphql-service --image gcr.io/archipel-app/graphql-service --platform managed --region europe-north1 --allow-unauthenticated --timeout=15m --add-cloudsql-instances archipel-app:europe-north1:archipel-production-database --update-env-vars INSTANCE_CONNECTION_NAME="archipel-app:europe-north1:archipel-production-database"
scripts.ship: npm run build && npm run deploy
